Contributor: Bancroft, Milton, artist.; United States. Navy Recruiting Station, publisher.;
Note: Signed "Milton Bancroft." Date based on America's participation in the war. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text says to enlist in the Navy. Illustration shows a sailor sounding a bugle as a call to arms.  The address of the Philadelphia Navy Recruiting Station is given at the bottom.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.

Title: Enlist in the Navy
